properties.sfomuseum:description: Two-page advertisement from November [unknown year] issue of Holiday promoting Pan American World Airways, with printed caption, “Good morning, ladies and gentlemen, this is the captain speaking... / Welcome aboard the new Pan Am Jet Clipper America” with color illustration depicting profile view of Boeing 707 aircraft in flight.
properties.sfomuseum:subject: Pan Am promotional advertisement
properties.wof:name: advertisement: Pan American World Airways, Holiday
